Documentation

If you are looking to get started with UpNext, you can check out our user documentation, were you will find a complete overview of the program’s features.

If you want to help out, I’d love to have someone sharing their knowledge with me. I’m fairly new to React, Electron and even programming itself. All help and tips are welcome! Take a look at UpNext’s developer documentation.
